DOC.brief_summary: Treadmill train show beneficial reduce motor symptom Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) . The mechanisms therapeutic effect treadmill train remain unknown . This study compare treadmill program generates high rate intrinsic feedback treadmill program focus generate high magnitude intrinsic feedback .
DOC.brief_title: Amplitude Rate Intrinsic Feedback During Treadmill Training Parkinson 's Disease
